Title: The End of the Affair
Writer: Graham Greene (from the novel by), Lenore J. Coffee (screenplay)
Actors: Deborah Kerr, Van Johnson, John Mills, Peter Cushing
Plot: In wartorn London Maurice Bendrix falls in love with neighbor Sarah Miles. They begin an illicit romance behind Sarah's husband's back. While war does not last forever, neither does love in this existentialist tale.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
